00240   bool parseEmfObject(const std::string& objectSerialized, T*& object_ptr, const std::string msgComp=std::string()) {
00241 
00242     object_ptr = NULL;
00243     try {
00244       //CREATE DATA MODEL
00245       T tmpObject;
00246       ecore::EPackage_ptr ecorePackage = tmpObject._eClass()->getEPackage();

00248

00256     return true;
